issue.title: [C++] Support ORC in Arrow Dataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13233](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13233). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow Datasets currently support Parquet but not ORC. ORC support needs to be added.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13233?focusedCommentId=17406810) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
`[~yingzhou474]` I didn't notice you already opened this issue about adding ORC support. I was working on the duplicate ARROW-13572, but I now turned that issue into a child task of this one (for the initial basic support), and opened some other child issues for follow-up improvements.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13233?focusedCommentId=17565612) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
